message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you for $950,000.

Alice, your product seems great, but $950,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in purchasing, but I'm only willing to go up to $850,000. This is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product yourself.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of that, we are willing to consider an offer closer to your suggested price. Therefore, we propose a counteroffer of $900,000 for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further.  $900,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm ready to close the deal at $875,000. This is a fair price considering our previous discussions and your own valuation.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, we have decided to adjust our counteroffer to $890,000 for the product. We hope this aligns more closely with your expectations while still reflecting its value.
